body:
We've built and released our fourth betting Model in 2021, and hopefully, you've been enjoying our **Australian Open Predictions**. This Model, developed by one of the sharpest sports betting data scientists in the industry, ingests dozens of tennis data sources to create probabilities for every tournament. Ok, now it's finals time. So let's get it going. The Model incorrectly predicted Brady as a value bet. She was big odds vs Osaka. We've left them up for you to see, as well as their futures price throughout the tournament. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Predictions**
As you can see, the clear value is with the king of Melbourne Park, and potential tennis goat, **Novak Djokovic**. We're expecting a hostile crowd for the Djoker but we have to be on him. The Model is comprehensively in his corner. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens' Odds** We've also got the futures markets, showing you live probabilities of each market. Here's the mens: - - -
Want the **best odds on tennis**? **Join the world's biggest sportsbook.** **JOIN BET365. NOW.**
- - - ## **Australian Open Women's Final Prediction**
I anticipated Osaka to match the -475 on the sportsbooks. I expect she'd be a dominant favorite. But thankfully, our iRobot says that **Brady is the bet**. Go you good thing! Model says she should be +244, not +425. Gotta be honest though, we're scared of Naomi. So maybe the +4.5 is the Brady bet. Either that, or take the +425 and back Osaka in the run. - - - ## **Australian Open Womens' Odds** - - - #### **Want tennis predictions all year? Sign up for the Wednesday email.** #### **We promise it's worth your time.**
title: 2021 Australian Open Predictions: Daily Tennis Betting Tips
